subject: Women's British Open (Golf)
Golf
United States Women's Open (Golf)
Kraft Nabisco Championship (Golf)
lead_paragraph: When the Women’s British Open became the L.P.G.A. Tour’s fourth major in 2001, the tour validated its claim to global golf, and the women’s game has continued to expand ever since.
snippet: When the Women’s British Open became the L.P.G.A. Tour’s fourth major in 2001, the tour validated its claim to global golf, and the women’s game has continued to expand ever since.
